pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Inference in Regression Discontinuity Designs // Implementation of the LoTTA (Local Trimmed Taylor Approximation) model described in "Bayesian Regression Discontinuity Design with Unknown Cutoff" by Kowalska, van de Wiel, van der Pas (2024) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2406.11585.
